pages.title: Magisteel
pages.text: Magisteel is an alloy made out of Steel, Silver and Gold. Each of the metals used represent a facet of the alloy: Steel for strength, Silver for magical affinity and Gold for purity.$(br)An alternative to Diamond, Magisteel tools and armor are stronger, tougher and easier to enchant.
Magisteel can only be crafted and is not naturally obtainable.
